column1:
The overall sentiment for cleanliness, amenities, location, services, general and value have seen an overall improvement over the years. Specifically, the sentiment for Cleanliness has improved from 61.9% in 2018 to 70.2% in 2019 and 54.9% in 2020. Amenities have seen an overall increase from 61.9% to 67.7% in 2019, and 65.2% in 2020. Location sentiment has improved from 0% in 2018 to 65.2% in 2019 and 63.5% in 2020. Services have seen an overall increase from 66.4% in 2018 to 61.3% in 2019, and 63.1% in 2020. General sentiment has increased from 73.6% in 2018 to 66.6% in 2019 and 62.7% in 2020. Finally, Value sentiment has improved from 0% in 2018 to 63.2% in 2019, and 59.9% in 2020.

Suggestions for improvement in each aspect can include increased attention to customer service, improved cleanliness standards, enhanced amenities, and improved value for money. Additionally, investing in better location facilities such as improved transport links, or providing more local attractions, can help boost customer sentiment. Finally, it is essential to monitor customer feedback on a regular basis to identify areas for improvement.
